pages.text: Unless one builds a base around a Monster Spawner, it can be quite tedious going back and forth from the block. It's unfortunate one cannot simply pick a up the arcane device and bring it where ever one goes. Unless...
The cage can capture the flaming core of the Spawner, breaking the block in the process.

Once the cage captures the Spawner's core, it can be right-clicked onto an empty Cursed Cage where it will convert it into a copy of the original Spawner, making the Cursed Infusion process and Mob Farming more convenient! Although doing this so will destroy the item in the process.
